name: Arcadia Finance
description: Arcadia built an intent-centric application where users can deposit their assets into sophisticated strategies that beat staking APRs and will dynamically suggest rebalancing actions into the highest-yielding opportunities available according to each individualâ€™s preferences and constraints. Arcadia takes advantage of the composability of DeFi to combine different protocols in interesting ways to maximize yields while providing best-in-class execution that streamline the way users interface with underlying protocols.
